%%% This file is for setting the data used in the template
%%% It is intended that this file will be automatically generated in the future
%%%%%%%  DO NOT ADD ANYTHING ELSE TO THIS FILE
%%%%%%%  Use Specification_AuthorSettings.tex for any additional features you wish to add

%%% Specification name, and acronym
%%% The title of your document will be built from this information.
% \setvalue{\specname}{Specification Name Placeholder}
% \setvalue{\specacro}{Specification Abbreviation}
% \setvalue{\version}{1.0}
\setvalue{\specname}{Simplified Electronic Notation for Sensor Reporting}
\setvalue{\specacro}{SENSR}
\setvalue{\version}{1.0}

%%% Specification 'phase'
\setboolean{betaOrFinal}{true}


%%% Titles
% If you wish to set a subtitle (reason for document, etc), do so here.
\setvalue{\subtitle}{}%Submission to ManTIS TF in Response to SENSR RFP (mantis/18-09-10)}


%%% Authorship
% \setvaluelist{\submitters}{{A, Inc.},{B, Inc.},{C, LLC},{D}}
% \setvalue{\leadsubmitter}{B, Inc.}
% \setvaluelist{\contributors}{{L, Inc.},{M Corp.},{N, PLLC}}
% \setvaluelist{\supporters}{{X, Inc.},{Y, LLC},{Z}}
% \setvalue{\pdfauthor}{Object Management Group}
\setvalue{\leadsubmitter}{Bosch Software Innovations, GmbH}
\setvaluelist{\submitters}{
    {Bosch Software Innovations, GmbH},
    {Elemental Reasoning, LLC}
}
\setvaluelist{\contributors}{}
\setvaluelist{\supporters}{}
% xxxxx with contact info
% For each of the above lists that you set, also set the contact info with the following format for each organization listed:
%    {Company Name\\ Contact Name\\ \href(mailto:contact@company.com}{contact@company.com}}
% If you set a list to empty above, set its corresponding list here to empty
\setvaluelist{\submitterswithcontactinfo}{
    {   Bosch Software Innovations, GmbH\\
        Dr. Axel Cordes\\
        \href{mailto:Axel.Cordes@de.bosch.com}{Axel.Cordes@de.bosch.com}
    },
    {   Elemental Reasoning, LLC\\ 
        Dr. Jason McC. Smith\\
        \href{mailto:jason@elementalreasoning.com}{jason@elementalreasoning.com}
    }
}
\setvaluelist{\contributorswithcontactinfo}{}
\setvaluelist{\supporterswithcontactinfo}{}

% Author of the PDF content
\setvalue{\pdfauthor}{Jason McC. Smith}

%%% Date of document submission
% Use \today to keep the current date, or set manually if you like.
% Recommended to set this to the {month year} of the TC meeting where
% it is presented / accepted.  Remember to spell out the entire month, and 
% use a four digit year.  "December 2019" not "Dec '19" or even "Dec 2019".
\setvalue{\subdate}{March 2022}

%%% Document numbers and auxilliary documents
% \setvalue{\docnum}{mantis/19-12-01}
\setvalue{\docnum}{dtc/2022-03-14}
%%% When setting this, use the format of {TF/YY-MM-nn \> Document Title}  The '\>' is a tabulating mark.  It is used in forming the titlepage.
\setvaluelist{\otherdocnums}{}
\setvaluelist{\associateddocs}{
    {mantis/19-12-04 \> SENSR XMI}
}
\setvaluelist{\ancillarydocs}{
    {mantis/19-12-03 \> SENSR (Changebar)}
}
\setvaluelist{\iris}{}%{https://www.omg.org/spec/SENSR/1.0}, {https://www.omg.org/spec/SENSR/20190901}}


%%% iprmode can take one of three values: rand, rflimited or nonassert
% \setvalue{\iprmode}{nonassert}
\setvalue{\iprmode}{nonassert}
